```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")
```


```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax))
```


```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```


creates the same scatterplot byt included piping 
```{r}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) + 
  geom_point()
```
